etymology.description: Depicts a piece of cloth used to cover something
etymology.interpretation: The character 冖(mì, 'cover') visually represents a cloth that is used to cover an object. It serves a straightforward illustrative purpose, showing the act of covering.

examples.chinese: 汉字中的冖(漢字中的冖)，代表了覆盖的意义(代表了覆蓋的意義)。
examples.pinyin: Hànzì zhōng de mì, dàibiǎo le fùgài de yìyì.
examples.english: The radical 冖 in Chinese characters represents the meaning of cover.

examples.chinese: 书法家喜爱用冖(書法家喜愛用冖)，装饰汉字(裝飾漢字)。
examples.pinyin: Shūfǎjiā xǐ'ài yòng mì, zhuāngshì hànzì.
examples.english: Calligraphers love to use 冖 to decorate Chinese characters.
